description:
This course helps students master the art of test taking. Who wouldn't want to benefit from a higher GPA and capitalize on all those hours spent studying.

By breaking down the preparation and actual process of answering questions, this course will provide the tools and techniques to help students of all academic abilities.

The modules follow a logical progression and dive into the various question formats commonly used by exam writers. Students of this course will learn how to eliminate the distractors and hone in on the correct answer.
title: Test Taking Strategies For Success
